GOV.UK

Operator Licensingalpha

  1. Home

Selfserve styleguide

A living styleguide for the OLCS Selfserve app

Typography

A typographic system based on the Alphagov toolkit

Form elements

Includes form wrapper elements, labelling, inputs and actions

Navigation elements

Includes a standard set of vertical and horizontal navigation mechanisms

Modals and messaging

Includes JavaScript and none-JavaScript versions of pop-ups, alerts and notices

Tables

Standard styling for CRUD and read-only tables and surrounding elements

Naming conventions

We have used BEM as a methodology for naming and classifying CSS selectors, in order to make them more strict, efficient and informative. Over-qualified selectors and excessive wrappers elements should be avoided.

Alphagov

The primary SASS file (main.scss) has a dependency on various functions, variables & mixins within the Alphagov frontend toolkit. This toolkit should never be edited and should be updated with extreme caution.

Requirements

  • Sass 3.3.3 (Maptastic Maple)
  • Node v0.10.26
